message: Hello Bob, I am offering you my product for $130. This is a high-quality item worth more than its face value, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $105?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I am unable to lower the price below $120 for this product. It's a fair price considering its value and quality.
